Albert B. Feldstein (October 24, 1925 – April 29, 2014) was an American writer, editor, and artist. He is best known for his work at EC Comics. He worked from 1956 to 1985 as the editor of the satirical magazine "Mad". After retiring from "Mad", Feldstein worked on American paintings of Western wildlife.
Feldstein died on April 29, 2014 at his home near Livingston, Montana. No cause of death was released.
